article.Heading: Budget 2016: Sensex, Nifty flat; ONGC, Dr Reddy's Labs top gainers
article.Summary: SBI, Tata Steel, ICICI Bank, Dr Reddy's Labs and ONGC are top gainers while GAIL, Hero, Cipla, HUL and Wipro are losers in the Sensex.
article.Body:
Moneycontrol Bureau

The Sensex is down 49.98 points at 23104.32 and the Nifty is down 15.60 points at 7014.15. About 858 shares have advanced, 992 shares declined, and 105 shares are unchanged.

SBI, Tata Steel, ICICI Bank, Dr Reddy's Labs and ONGC are top gainers while GAIL, Hero, Cipla, HUL and Wipro are losers in the Sensex.

With a large portion of its portfolio devoted to India, Cartica Capital does not change its positioning in the short-term, says Katalin Gingold, Head-Equity Research. She is hoping there will be a fine balancing act in the Budget. She believes in the long-term, India is poised to outperform other emerging markets. She says: "Our positioning hasn't changed in anticipation of the Budget."

Posted by Nasrin Sultana
Follow @NasrinzStory
